resources.string: Your Password will be saved in your Internal device. No Internet connection required.\n\nNote: After you uninstall this app you will lose all your data.

Your password will be saved in device as well as on cloud database. Internet connection is required only while adding a new password.

Note : 
1. Your password will be safe even if you uninstall this app.
2. The password is encrypted in the such a way that no one can see it (including us).
If you ever installed this app before, try signIn, your saved passwords will be restored.
